data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of eelpout (Teleostei: Zoarcidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mincarone, Michael Maia, Anderson, Eric (2008): A new genus and species of eelpout (Teleostei: Zoarcidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 1852: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183453
